full_summary:
### Tender Requirement
#### Description
**Winter Abrasives for Jasper National Park**
Parks Canada Agency's Highway Operations Unit requires the production, mixing, and delivery of Winter Abrasives for Jasper National Park. The Winter Abrasives will be used as part of the regular winter maintenance of the park's roadways.

#### Date Specification
* **Publication Date**: 28 April 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 26 May 2023 (14:00 EDT)
* **Amendment Date**: 28 April 2023

#### Requirements
The tender requires the production and crushing of Winter Abrasives, as well as their delivery to the Jasper Highways compound. The successful bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the closing date.

#### Important Information for Bidders
All bids submitted after the closing date of 26 May 2023 (14:00 EDT) will be considered non-responsive.

#### Background Information
This requirement is a request for proposal (RFP) under the procurement category of Goods and Services (_GD_). The procurement method is competitive, open bidding.

#### Procurement Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3937951022
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (_Demande de propositions_)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (_GD_)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (_Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner_)

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders participating in the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (_Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou_)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (_Accord de continuité commerciale Canada-Royaume-Uni_)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (_Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama_)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (_Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée_)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (_Accord économique et commercial global_ (_AECG_) _entre le Canada et l’Union européenne (UE)_)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (_Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce_ (_AMP-OMC_))
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (_Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili_)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (_Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie
